import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCircleXmark } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import React from 'react' import './reserve.css' import useFetch from '../../hooks/useFetch' export default function Reserve({setOpen, hotelId}) { const {data, loading, error} = useFetch(`hotels/room/${hotelId}`) return (
setOpen(false)}/> Select your rooms: {data.map(item=>(
{item.title}
{item.desc}
Max people: {item.maxPeople}
))}
) }
